pkgmetadata.longdescription: Debris-Containing Droplet Identification using EM // Identification of debris-containing droplets from a droplet- based single cell/nucleus RNA-seq. 'diem' uses the expression profile of background RNA droplets, followed by expectation maximization (EM), to assign candidates as debris or nuclei. See Alvarez M, Rahmani E, et al (2019) doi:10.1101/786285 for details.
